Package ch.se.inf.ethz.jcd.batman.vdisk

Provides a representation of the underlying virtual disk and it's structure.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IDataBlock
    Represents a block containing metadata and data on the virtual Disk.
    IFreeBlock
    Represents a block that is not used to save useful data.
    IVirtualBlock
    Represents a block on the virtual disk.
    IVirtualDirectory
    Represents a directory on the virtual disk.
    IVirtualDisk
    Represents a VirtualDisk.
    IVirtualDiskEntry
    Represents an entry inside the virtual disk.
    IVirtualDiskSpace
    A IVirtualDiskSpace is a simple abstraction of a list of IDataBlock.
    IVirtualFile
    Represents a file on the virtual disk.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    FileState
    Represents the states in which a virtual disk entry ( IVirtualDiskEntry, VirtualDiskEntry) can be.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    FileAlreadyExistsException
    Checked exception thrown when an attempt is made to create a file or directory and a file of that name already exists.
    VirtualDiskException
    Checked exception thrown when an error occurs in the IVirtualDisk

Package ch.se.inf.ethz.jcd.batman.vdisk Description

Provides a representation of the underlying virtual disk and it's structure. Classes in this package provide the client with direct access to all low level operations and data. As far as possible this classes do not use any higher abstraction to hide details. It is not recommended to use this classes directly but rather to use ch.se.inf.ethz.jcd.batman.io.
